goal.en: "Introducing the foundamental concepts and the govering theory of electromagnetism; its characteristics, interaction with material and applications."
goal.ch: 介紹靜電磁場及時變場基本概念以及電磁場在物質空間之特性、行為與其應用。

content.en:
"Goals:
Electromagnetics is the study of the effects of electric charge at rest and in motion.
Contents
1. Electromagnetic model
2. Static electric field
Test 1
3. Steady electric currents
4. Steady magnetic field
Test 2
5. Time-varying field and Maxwell‘s equations
Test 3
6. Plane electromagnetic wave
7. Antennas and radiation systems
Test 4"
content.ch:
"課程目標：介紹靜電磁場及時變場基本概念以及電磁場在物質空間之特性、行為與其應用。
課程大綱：
1. 靜電之電場、電位
2. 介電質與 導體
3. 靜磁場與向量位場
4. 磁性物質
5. 法拉第定律及馬克士威方程式
6. 電磁波在介質中之傳播及邊界值等問題。"

textbook.en: "1 Fundamentals of Applied Electromagnetics,F.T. Ulaby, U. Ravaioli, 7th Ed., Pearson Ltd. 2. Field and Wave Electromagnetics, David K. Cheng. 2. Introduction to Electrodynamics, David J. Griffiths 3. Applied Electromagnetism, Shen/Kong"
textbook.ch: "1. Fundamentals of Applied Electromagnetics,F.T. Ulaby, U. Ravaioli, 7th Ed., Pearson Ltd. 2. Introduction to Electrodynamics, David J. Griffiths 3. Applied Electromagnetism, Shen/Kong"
